text: "Advice for the Young at Heart" is a 1990 song by British new wave band Tears for Fears and is the third single from their third studio album The Seeds of Love. It went to number 15 in Ireland, number 22 in the Netherlands, number 25 in Canada, number 31 in France, number 34 in Belgium, number 36 in the United Kingdom, number 49 in Italy and number 89 in the United States. ==Track listings== ; CD single # "Advice for the Young at Heart" — 4:49 # "Johnny Panic and the Bible of Dreams" — 4:16 # "Music for Tables" — 3:32 # "Johnny Panic And the Bible of Dreams" (instrumental) — 4:18 ; 7" single # "Advice for the Young at Heart" — 4:45 # "Johnny Panic and the Bible of Dreams" — 4:16 ; 12" single # "Advice for the Young at Heart" — 4:49 # "Johnny Panic and the Bible of Dreams" — 4:16 # "Music for Tables" — 3:32 == References == Category:1990 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:Tears for Fears songs Category:Sophisti-pop songs
